summary: I am a determined,highly accomplished and self-motivated individual with an out-going likable personality and an ability to work effectively as part of a team as well on own initiative.I possess a fresh, modern approach to the Computer science industry, and employ creative and enthusiastic methods to problem solving.Currently I am an undergraduate Computer Science student in University of Colombo School of Computing and looking for an opportunity in the field of Computer Science as a software engineer in a renowned organization.

school.name: University of Colombo School of Computing

projects.title: ‘’Save ON’’-Electrical power saving software and electronic basic system (ongoing)
projects.description:
3rd year SAD group project and currently in development stage. Up to now I involved in the basic designing part and interface creating part.

Technologies using: C, C#, Python, Microsoft SQL

projects.title: ‘’SHARE A LITTLE’’ - Website for National Blood Bank, Sri Lanka
projects.description:
2nd year SAD group project and I took part in the designing and development of the website for National Blood Bank Sri Lanka, which helps to find matching blood samples from the nearest hospitals as soon as possible in an urgent situation. 

Technologies used: PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

profile_positions.description:
•	Work under Kanban agile framework and move along with a CI/CD release process. 
•	Analyze client requirements thoroughly and get cleared unclear areas in the requirement.
•	Actively participate for client calls and maintain direct communications with the client to get the requirements precisely.
•	Analyze availability of client data in the database as well as in the data source files.
•	In case the required data is not available, effectively work along with other teams and take next steps to make data available for the project.
•	Focus on each member in the team and guide them the way to go when a task is assigned.
•	Guide the team to utilize their time for work in an efficient and effective way.
•	Give fullest support to the team by avoiding blockers.
•	Perform root cause analysis of client issues/defects and figure out the most suitable solution.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Work under Kanban agile framework and move along with a CI/CD release process. 
•	Analyze client requirements thoroughly and get cleared unclear areas in the requirement.

•	Do client deliveries on time.
•	Train new resources by providing required business domain knowledge and technical background. 
•	Perform root cause analysis of client issues/defects and figure out the most suitable solution.
•	Motivate the team towards a common goal.
•	Play any kind of role in the implementation process when it is essential.

profile_positions.title: Technical Client Lead

profile_positions.description:
Train new resources by providing required business domain knowledge and technical background 
Work under Scrum agile framework and move along with a CI/CD release process. 
Develop and maintain detailed test cases based on business requirements
Perform black and white box tests of many types including unit,integration, regression, smoke, performance, stress, functionality,compatibility testing etc. and effectively communicate test status.
Indentify gaps between actual and expected results and report bugs using Azure DevOps application. 
Perform root cause analysis of client issues/defects and suggest effective solutions
Analyze availability of client data in the database as well as in the data source files 
Validate accuracy of client data in the database
Validate stored procedures by verifying accuracy of business and mathematical logics included 
Perform static analysis of source code using complexity metrics
Create comprehensive SQL test queries and scripts according to the test cases created
Update and maintain SQL scripts and test cases as applications and business rules change and identify areas of improvement
Create YAML files for stored procedures and validate data service output
Test both web and windows based desktop applications related to investment management domain
profile_positions.title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Work under Agile process and move along with a CI/CD release process. 
•	Develop and maintain detailed test cases based on business requirements.
•	Develop, execute & maintain automated tests using Selenium framework.
•	Perform black and white box tests of many types including unit, integration, regression, smoke, performance, stress, functionality, compatibility testing etc. and effectively communicate test status.
•	Identify gaps between actual and expected results and report bugs using Atlassian JIRA application. 
•	Perform root cause analysis of client issues/defects and suggest effective solutions.
•	Analyze availability of client data in the database as well as in the data source files. 
•	Validate accuracy of client data in the database.
•	Validate stored procedures by verifying accuracy of business and mathematical logics included. 
•	Perform static analysis of source code using complexity metrics.
•	Create comprehensive SQL test queries and scripts according to the test cases created.
•	Update and maintain SQL scripts and test cases as applications and business rules change and identify areas of improvement.
•	Create YAML files for stored procedures and validate data service output.
•	Test web applications in different browsers and operating systems using BrowserStack.
•	Test windows-based desktop application related to investment management domain.
profile_positions.title: Technical Quality Assurance Engineer
